item.title: #TIL : Bash shell shortcuts
item.description: Bash shell shortcuts Ctrl + e : jump cursor to EOL Ctrl + a : jump cursor to BOL (beginning of line) Ctrl + u : delete all from cursor to BOL Ctrl + k : delete all from cursor to EOL Ctrl + r : search history, press again for next search Ctrl + l : clear shell screen Ctrl + c : terminate the command (sometimes have to press twice) Ctrl + z : suspend the command, back to shell.
